content: Have not beaten yet but fun if you love Animal Farm. You make decisions season by season that run parallel to the issues facing the animals in the novel. Good art decent voice overs and overall just okay really basic. Pilgrims better and offered more interesting choices

Really enjoying this take on the novel. In terms of gameplay it reminds me a lot of 80 Days. I'm not sure how enjoyable it would be without having read the book but maybe it will encourage people to read it. The narration by Abubakur Salim is stunning. Would have been nice to have voices for all dialogue but that's a minor niggle
This game is true to the book. A great experience. Would love to see more games like this.

Orwell's novel + Reins = a multy ending grimm and fascinating storytelling experience... Who side will you take? What moral will you follow? Hard choices ahead and still a reflection on what is happening in the world today...
I'd recommend having the handbook not spoil the whole plot :(
